kit.leader_skill: "Peppy Gals" Category or Super TEQ Type Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +120%

super_attack.name: Fake Tears Ruse
super_attack.effect: Raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage to enemy; Raises allies' ATK & DEF by 30% for 2 turns

passive_skill.name: Ranfan's True Nature
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 200% up; (Forever) Chance of evading enemy's attack 40% up; (Forever) All allies' Ki +1 and DEF 40% up, plus an additional Ki +1 and DEF 30% up for characters who also belong to the "Peppy Gals" Category; When attacking: ATK & DEF 200% up; ATK & DEF 50% up (up to 200%) and chance of evading enemy's attack & damage reduction rate 10% up (up to 40%) per "Peppy Gals" Category ally on the team; After receiving or evading an attack: All allies' ATK 20% up ("Peppy Gals" Category allies excluded); "Peppy Gals" Category allies' ATK 20% up for 2 turns; When facing only 1 enemy: Attacked enemy's ATK & DEF 30% for 2 turns; Great chance of stunning the attacked enemy for 2 turns; Great chance of sealing the attacked enemy's Super Attack for 2 turns; When the target enemy is in the following status: , , or: Launches an additional Super Attack
